column5: The Clinical Education - MSc/PGDip/PGCert course at the University of Leicester will help you become an effective clinical teacher and develop your skills in educational leadership, scholarship, and discovery. The modules are based around three themes: clinical education in practice; educational leadership and scholarship; and educational discovery. You will also have the opportunity to study alongside qualified clinicians from different backgrounds, supported by leading researchers and practitioners. This postgraduate qualification can be taken as an intercalated MSc (iMSc) by students studying for an undergraduate medical degree.Â
